name: harvest-balance-calculator
description: With this project you can calculate how much overtime or time you owe based on the average hours you should work per weeks.

scripts.docker:teststep: docker run harvest-balance-calculator python3 -m unittest discover -v
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:codestyle && npm run docker:teststep
